page.title: 16CATTLE
page.content: One owner farmer breeds the {"Red Poll"}cattle.This breed originates from the crossing of the {Norfolk Poll}and the{Suffolk Dun. They are a hornless breed and termed dual purpose cattle i.e. good milkers and good beef. This particular farmer has been breeding these for forty years and has at the moment four generations on his farm. The average age of the{"Red Poll"}is thirteen years.The farmer is now semi-retired and has only twelve head of cattle. The only other type of cattle in this area are{Friesians.
